metadata.synopsis: Reflection on the Selunite necklace found in the abandoned village.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the abandoned village in act 12. Loot the Selunite necklace in the blacksmith

0.speaker: Player
0.context: NodeContext: Upon seeing a Selunite necklace

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Moon witch rubbish. How much time did some dimwitted artisan waste on that?
1.context: NodeContext: Disdain upon seeing a Selunite necklace (SH is known to be a Shar worshipper)

2.speaker: Player
2.context: NodeContext: Guarded disdain upon seeing a Selunite necklace (SH is not known to be a Shar worshipper)
